forWho.que: Is this online Python training course for beginners?
forWho.ans:
Yes, this free python course starts from scratch, and any newbie can learn easily.
Python is the most popular programming language on the planet. It has quickly become a preferred language for everything from desktop apps, web development to Data Science and Machine Learning. Although anyone can learn Python and carve his/her career, here are the kind of professionals / beginners who can easily go for this free Python course:

comapnies.title: ompanies you can expect when you get Python-certified with us

faq.que: Is the Python course free or is it paid?
faq.ans: It is a completely free python course and there is no payment required

faq.que: How long are the free python course materials accessible?
faq.ans: The python for beginners course will be available for the lifetime, which includes sessions along with the complete Python study material, python practicals, and python projects.

faq.que: Is this Free Python Course for Beginners?
faq.ans: This Python course covers all the topics from scratch till the advanced level (ie python basics to advanced). So, any beginner or a person with experience can take advantage of this python training.

faq.que: How do I get answer to my python queries?
faq.ans: The doubts can be posted on the discussion forum. Our support team will answer the python queries

faq.que: How will I perform the Python practicals?
faq.ans: For Python practicals, We will provide manual and study material in the LMS and you need to install it on your system.

faq.que: What do I need in order to attend the course?
faq.ans: To attend this free Python training, you just need a laptop or PC with a good internet connection. You must be eager to learn inorder to carve your career in a booming field.

faq.que: What things do I need to learn Python through this course?
faq.ans: To attend this free online Python training, you just need a laptop or a PC with minimum 4GB RAM. Nothing else is required to learn it.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required to attend this python course?
faq.ans: It is recommended to have a minimum of an i3 processor, 20 GB free disk, and 4 GB RAM for installing python and related software.

faq.que: Is this python course for one looking for Data Science carrer option?
faq.ans: Yes, this python course in hindi covers all the basics python concepts to learn python programming and also includes the foundation topics for a person looking for data science job. Our free python training starts with basics then we cover multiple workshops, POCs, and live projects. These python classes will help you get your dream Data Science job in the industry.

faq.que: What will be the end result of DataFlair Free online Python training course?
faq.ans: This python course not only covers python basics for beginners but also includes full stack python development. When you finish this free course, you will be equipped with practical skills and theoretical knowledge the industry looks for. You will bloom into a certified Python professional who is ready to take on Data Science Projects in top organizations.

faq.que: Where do python students come from?
faq.ans: DataFlair has blend of students from 130+ Countries. Apart from India, we provide training in the US, UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and many others covering the globe. You can learn python free from across the world with our innovative online training.

faq.que: Is this Free python course for programmers classroom-based?
faq.ans: This free python training program in hindi is entirely online and self-paced.

faq.que: Why should I learn Python?
faq.ans: Python is one of the most popular programming languages on the planet and is also a very handy and general purpose language with simple syntax and wide range of carrer options. Learn python will be your best investment – we offer best way to learn python ie learn python online. You can learn python from the comfort of your home at your own pace and convenience.

faq.que: Will there be any certificate provided as a part of the python course?
faq.ans:
Yes, you will be provided with an industry-recognized python certification.
Once you finish this python certification course, you will work on real-time Python projects after successful submission, you will be awarded DataFlair python online course certification.

Feel free to contact us by dropping a mail to
info@data-flair.training

faq.que: What type of python projects will I be doing during the training?
faq.ans: You will be doing Python real life projects in different domains like retail, banking, and finance. After successful completion of this best python course, we will assign 100+ live projects on python, the projects are derived from industry requirements and real-world problems

faq.que: After python full course do you provide placement assistance?
faq.ans: This python full course in Hindi is a job-oriented program and will prepare you completely for interviews. After working on tons of python projects, you will be ready to work in the industry, we will offer job portal where we post relevant jobs, now whichever python job is matching your profile you can apply there.

faq.que: Does this course contain only theory concepts?
faq.ans:
This python hindi course contains both theoretical and practical concepts as well as real-time python projects.
Here you can learn python from scratch with fundamental concepts, after that you can jump to intermediate level and make hands dirty with python practicals. At the end work on live projects to master the python programming language.

faq.que: Can I attend a demo session before enrolling for this free Python course?
faq.ans: Yes, you can attend the demo Python class recording on this course page to understand the python training quality we provide. This is what creates the difference between DataFlair and other online Python training providers.

faq.que: Can you guide me about the career aspects of Python developers?
faq.ans:
Python is the technology that will open many doors for you. Not only is it a general-purpose language, it is used everywhere from scripting and web scraping to hot topics like Data Science and Machine Learning. With Python, you can be a:
  • Python Developer
  • Data Scientist
  • Python Research Analyst
  • Software Engineer
  • Software Developer
  • Data Analyst

faq.que: Why should I enroll in this Free Python Course?
faq.ans:
This free python course in Hindi gives hands-on learning with basics of python programming to real-time python projects.
This course includes python tutorial, data structures with python, basic coding in python, python programming basics, real-time examples of python programming to make you a python expert.
Self paced training with lifetime access to the course, study material, practical codes, quizzes, interview guides,

faq.que: Is this Python course completely free or do I need to pay anything in between?
faq.ans: It’s a completely Free python course in Hindi and you need not pay anything for it. Even Python Certification is also free – ie we offer free python course with certificate.
